test_cases.summary: Verify that the all fields are blank when a user opens the registration form
Verify that user cannot proceed the registration process without filling any fields
test_cases.expected_result: The red messages is shown that indicates about neccessity to fill mandatory field

test_cases.summary: Verify that the user is able to go to the login page by clicking on the "Enter into account" button

steps.3: Click on the "Enter into account" button

test_cases.expected_result: The page with the login functionality is opened

test_cases.summary: Verify that the user is able to register by entering the valid data in the all fields

steps.3: Enter a valid name and last name
steps.5: Enter a valid password and click the "Further" button

test_cases.expected_result: The user proceeds to the "Mobile number" page

test_cases.summary: Verify that system cannot accept numbers in the Name field

steps.3: Enter numbers in the "First name" field
steps.5: Enter a valid Enter email name
steps.6: Enter a valid password and click the "Further" button

test_cases.expected_result: The system shows the message about name correctness
